original_text: With it we bless our Lord and Father, and with it we curse people who are made in the likeness of God.
korean_text: 이것으로 우리가 주 아버지를 찬송하고 또 이것으로 하나님의 형상대로 지음을 받은 사람을 저주하나니

sentences.original_text: With it we bless our Lord and Father
and with it we curse people
who are made in the likeness of God.
